original: na mo bha ga ba te /üîΩaushn'i sh'a ya dha re /
analyzed: na mo bha ga ba te / aushn'i sh'a ya dha re /

original: ma bsgrubs kyang las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te gi wang la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpral bar thig le byas na gang bltas pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bsgrubs kyang las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te gi wang la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpral bar thig le byas na gang bltas pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one recites it one hundred and eight times over yellow orpiment and makes a bindu on one's forehead, whoever one looks at will become pleased.

original: mig rtsi la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags te mig la bskus na gang dang phrad par bya ba de dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig rtsi la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags te mig la bskus na gang dang phrad par bya ba de dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one enchants eye ointment one hundred and eight times and applies it to one's eyes, whoever one meets will become pleased.

original: chu khyor gang la lan bdun bzlas te 'thungs na ma bslangs par zas rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu khyor gang la lan bdun bzlas te 'thungs na ma bslangs par zas rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one drinks a handful of water enchanted seven times, one will obtain food without asking.

original: tshogs pa'i nang du 'gro na bdag gi gos kyi mtha' ma nas lag pa g-yon pas bzung la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas tshogs pa'i nang du song na tshig btsan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i nang du 'gro na bdag gi gos kyi mtha' ma nas lag pa g-yon pas bzung la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas tshogs pa'i nang du song na tshig btsan par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one goes to an assembly, holding the end of one's garment with one's left hand and reciting twenty-one times, one's words will be authoritative in the assembly.

original: tshig btsan pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: tshig btsan pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
